name: community.secondlife.com - Badges Much Room
description:
When installed, this CSS snippet will hide the text, overlay and bowling pin icon on forum avatars that use badges. Hover the mouse over the badge to see the hidden details.

"Plain" forum avatars without badges are left alone.
